name: Between the Worlds 2: The Pyramid
storyline: The residents of a small American town are anxious: an eccentric but famous professor has mysteriously disappeared. On a dark, stormy night an odd old gentleman suddenly appeared at the door of your detective agency and left a message with a request for help on behalf of the missing Professor.
summary: Search the Professor's abode for hints, decipher his messages, put to use a magic artifact, play fun and brainy mini-games, and delve into a world of technology and magic.
